trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMovingEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.

Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 表示將會處理 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving" /> 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving> event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server control is being moved within its own zone, or to another zone.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving>就會引發事件時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>或它自己的區域內，或另一個區域，移動其他伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: This can occur both when a user drags a control, and when there is a programmatic move.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者拖曳控制項，及以程式設計方式移動時，也可能會發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving> event is raised by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartMoving%2A> method, and it provides an opportunity to cancel the moving process before it is complete.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving>就會引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartMoving%2A>方法，這個方法，並提供完成之前取消移動程序的機會。

trans-unit.source: If the move is completed and the control placed in a new position, this event is followed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果已完成的移動，並放在新位置的控制項，此事件後面是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved>事件。

trans-unit.source: The method specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMovingEventHandler> delegate will be called when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 中指定的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMovingEventHandler>委派時將會呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving>就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: Page developers can create a custom handler for the event by adding the `OnWebPartMoving` attribute to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 網頁開發人員可以建立自訂事件處理常式加入`OnWebPartMoving`屬性`<asp:webpartmanager>`項目，並將自訂的方法名稱指派給屬性。

trans-unit.source: A custom handler can also be assigned programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 自訂處理常式也可以指派以程式設計的方式。

trans-unit.source: For more information on programmatically assigning an event handler, see [NIB: How to: Connect Event Handler Methods to Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關以程式設計的方式指派的事件處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 如何： 連接事件處理常式方法的事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc)。
